long_description: Offering great stopping power and value, the Avid BB5 mechanical disc brake offers all-weather performance that won't break the bank. Tri-Align Caliper Positioning System(TM) aligns caliper perfectly without shims. Features inboard pad adjustment, tough melt-forged body and tool-free pad replacement. Integrated cable stop prevents routing cable and housing from entering the brake at odd angles, reducing the possibility of cable drag. Avid BB5 mechanical disc brake includes 1 caliper and a 160mm rotor; can be mounted for either front or rear use. Please note: does not include brake lever; brake is compatible with most mountain-style cable levers.
short_description: Offering great stopping power and value, the Avid BB5 mechanical disc brake offers all-weather performance that won't break the bank.
